test.doc: Verify the download button. The following steps are executed: - Open the NG Gallery page - Click on the drop down box - Click on the product type 'Meteosat 0 degree Imagery' - Click on the product type 'MSGIODC RGB Composites' (one of the type 41 degree) - Verify that all layers of thet type exist
test.status: Keyword 'File Should Exist' failed after retrying for 30 seconds. The last error was: No keyword with name 'File Should Exist' found.

suite.doc: Shall be possible to download the currently displayed region by just clicking on a button and choose the type which we need: jpeg, png, tiff. The output image should contain a footer with the EUMETSAT logo and timestamp of the selected layer.
